title: Zero COVID-19 deaths confirmed
body_lines: Health officials state that zero COVID-19 deaths were confirmed on Sunday, with the country’s COVID-19 death toll remaining at 16,502.

According to the Epidemiology Unit, 76.29% of the total COVID-19 deaths are over 60 years, 22.4% are between 30 and 59 years, and 1.31% are below 30 years. A total of 9,314 COVID-19 confirmed to date are male and 7,188 are female.
